anglr 0.4.8
  • Reference
  • Changelog

TRI model extensions

TRI.QUAD.Rd

TRI model from silicate is extended by methods for QUAD.

# S3 method for QUAD
TRI(x, ...)

Arguments

x

QUAD

Examples

library(anglr)
library(raster)
r <- setExtent(raster(volcano), extent(0, nrow(volcano), 0, ncol(volcano)))
a <- QUAD(r)
x <- copy_down(TRI(a), r)
nrow(x$vertex)
#> [1] 5456
mesh <- DEL(x, max_area = .2)
#> Error: Columns `.vx0`, `.vx1`, `.vx2` not found
mesh <- copy_down(mesh, r)
#> Error in copy_down(mesh, r): object 'mesh' not found
nrow(mesh$vertex)
#> Error in nrow(mesh$vertex): object 'mesh' not found
